1.1.7.2 Help the team in community based maternal death review.
11
1.2 Facility Level service provision
1.2.1 Routine OPD: CHO should ensure that all the OPD services are happening daily and pregnant 
women are examined daily.
1.2.2 VHSND: CHO should conduct VHSND in the SHC-HWC and provide all the range of services as 
mentioned in field level VHSND above.
